mapper.select: SELECT short_name,SUM(weigui_subs_cnt) AS weigui_subs_cnt FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1101_prvd WHERE aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} and weigui_subs_cnt != 0 group by prvd_id ORDER BY SUM(weigui_subs_cnt) DESC,prvd_id
SELECT short_name,SUM(weigui_subs_cnt) AS trade_value FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1101_prvd WHERE aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} group by prvd_id ORDER BY SUM(weigui_subs_cnt) DESC,prvd_id
SELECT aud_trm as aud_trm_end,SUM(weigui_subs_cnt) AS weigui_subs_cnt FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1101_prvd WHERE aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} group by aud_trm ORDER BY aud_trm

SELECT aud_trm_begin, aud_trm as aud_trm_end, short_name, weigui_subs_cnt, tol_subs_cnt, per*100 as per FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1101_prvd WHERE aud_trm = #{params.currSumEndDate} order by aud_trm desc,weigui_subs_cnt desc,prvd_id

SELECT aud_trm_begin, aud_trm as aud_trm_end, prvd_id, short_name, weigui_subs_cnt, tol_subs_cnt, per*100 as per, ranking FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1101_prvd WHERE aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} order by aud_trm desc,weigui_subs_cnt desc,prvd_id
